about_the_game:
The official OST for Veilcrest: Trial of the Arcane by Repulse.


Includes music from the entire game - Level Themes, Romantic and Ambient tracks together with character motifs. Immerse yourself in the Veilcrest: Trial of The Arcane Original Soundtrack, inviting you to journey through tranquil forests, ancient and enchanted lands, mystical challenges, and more. Experience the music that captures the emotions of our characters where your love interests reveal their feelings and develop bonds with you. Whether you're uncovering hidden secrets, forging deep connections with allies, or exploring the mystical realms, let the music from Veilcrest: Trial of The Arcane transport you to a world where anything is possible.

Credits:

Composer
  • Hristo Arabadzhiev
Additional Artists
  • Radoslav Marinchev - Additional guitars on "My Bedroom" OST

As long as you are not directly reuploading the music with no other content you are free to use the songs in this OST in any videos or streams whether they are monetized or not.
